title: Problem 2109_B
statement: Duelists Mouf and Fouad enter the arena, which is an n × m grid!Fouad's monster starts at cell (a, b), where rows are numbered 1 to n and columns 1 to m.Mouf and Fouad will keep duelling until the grid consists of only one cell.In each turn: Mouf first cuts the grid along a row or column line into two parts, discarding the part without Fouad's monster.
